reference.title: GhostScript distiller plug-in developer reference
reference.shortdesc: The GhostScript distiller plug-in for DITA-OT is a PDF post-processor that allows converting PS to PDF.

section.p: The GhostScript distiller plug-in supports the following properties:

dlentry.dd: Name of the PDF generator to use. The only supported value is ghostscript, which enables the plug-in; all other values will result in the plug-in being disabled.
